section.heading: Pleading.
section.text: In a derivative action under § 29-808.02, the complaint shall state with particularity:

para.text: The date and content of plaintiff’s demand and the response to the demand by the managers or other members; or
If a demand has not been made, the reasons a demand under § 29-808.02(1) would be futile.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 904 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act).
